projects.name: Portfolio Site
projects.description: This is the site you are currently on!

projects.name: Packing Some Smack!
projects.description: Fighting game with original characters; coded entirely with Java. I was the lead developer of this project which was made by the RHS Programming Club.

projects.name: Music Generator
projects.description: Music generator is a website that creates music with random notes. This project was first meant to be a desktop GUI application written in C++, but after working on it for a few weeks, I ended up rewriting it into a website.

projects.name: Birthday Countdown
projects.description: Website that displays a countdown of the closest birthday a database. This was a hackathon project I made during spring break. It was the first full stack web application I ever made. I had learned about databases, node, and express from this project.

projects.name: 3D Tic-tac-toe
projects.description: Website that plays tic tac toe, but in 3D. This was just a quick project to test out three.js. I had seen the library and I wanted to see what it could do, so I made this project in two days to test it out.

projects.name: Console Arcade
projects.description: An application that played multiple arcade games in the console. I created this as a hackathon project, and it was coded completely with C.

projects.name: RHS Discord Bot
projects.description: Very simple reminder discord bot. Stores reminders of servers in MongoDB database, and pings people when the reminder is set to go off.

projects.name: Todo List
projects.description: Simple todo list website, that also has accounts, and logins. I made this projects to learn the MERN stack, and CSS. I had previously used bootstrap for styling frontend, but I decided to try to learn CSS for this project.
